veg.name: Mango Pickle
veg.description: Tangy and spicy mango pickle made from handpicked raw mangoes, traditional spices, and cold-pressed oil.

veg.name: Gongura Pickle
veg.description: Authentic Andhra-style gongura pickle made with fresh sorrel leaves and aromatic spices.

reviews.comment: A bit spicy for my taste.

veg.name: Lemon Pickle
veg.description: Sun-cured lemon pickle with a tangy and spicy punch, made using rock salt and chili powder.

veg.name: Tomato Pickle
veg.description: Homemade tomato pickle cooked slowly with spices and tamarind for a rich taste.

reviews.comment: Goes perfectly with rice and dosa.
Could be a little less sour.

veg.name: Amla Pickle
veg.description: Nutritious amla pickle made with tangy Indian gooseberries, spices, and sesame oil.

reviews.comment: Nice, but amla pieces are a bit hard.

veg.name: Green Chilli Pickle
veg.description: Spicy green chilli pickle with mustard seeds, fenugreek, and tangy lemon juice.

veg.name: Mixed Vegetable Pickle
veg.description: A mix of carrots, cauliflower, and beans preserved with spices and oil.

reviews.comment: Could use a little more salt.

veg.name: Garlic Pickle
veg.description: Strong and aromatic garlic pickle with spicy masala for a bold flavor.

reviews.comment: A bit too strong, but I love it.

veg.name: Red Chilli Pickle
veg.description: Fiery red chilli pickle made with dried red chillies, mustard seeds, and tamarind pulp.

veg.name: Curry Leaf Pickle
veg.description: Aromatic curry leaf pickle with roasted spices and tangy tamarind for a unique taste.

nonVeg.name: Chicken Pickle
nonVeg.description: Juicy chicken pieces marinated with Andhra-style spices and slow-cooked in gingelly oil for a long shelf life.

reviews.comment: Perfect with hot rice, mouth-watering taste.
Tasty, but I wish it had more gravy.

nonVeg.name: Mutton Pickle
nonVeg.description: Tender mutton pieces slow-cooked with aromatic spices for a rich, authentic flavor.

nonVeg.name: Fish Pickle
nonVeg.description: Fresh fish chunks fried and preserved in tangy, spicy masala for a coastal-style taste.

reviews.comment: Reminds me of home-cooked coastal pickles.
Very good, but bones in a few pieces.

nonVeg.name: Prawn Pickle
nonVeg.description: Succulent prawns cooked with garlic, ginger, and red chilli powder for a spicy seafood delight.

reviews.comment: Perfect spice level, prawns are fresh.

nonVeg.name: Crab Pickle
nonVeg.description: Fresh crab meat cooked with special masala for a unique seafood pickle experience.

reviews.comment: Amazing flavor, great with steamed rice.
Tasty but a little hard to eat due to shells.

nonVeg.name: Goat Liver Pickle
nonVeg.description: Nutrient-rich goat liver pickle with a bold, spicy masala and strong aroma.

reviews.comment: Rich and flavorful, perfect for health.

karapodi.name: Kandi Podi (కంది పొడి)
karapodi.description: Traditional Andhra-style toor dal powder with garlic, red chillies, and spices. Perfect with hot rice and ghee.

reviews.comment: Very good, but a little spicy.

karapodi.name: Nalla Karam Podi (నల్ల కారం పొడి)
karapodi.description: A spicy and aromatic black chilli powder made with roasted spices and garlic.

karapodi.name: Idli Podi (ఇడ్లీ పొడి)
karapodi.description: Special podi made from roasted lentils and spices, best served with sesame oil or ghee.

reviews.comment: Idlis taste so much better with this.

karapodi.name: Peanut Podi (వేరుసెనగ పొడి)
karapodi.description: Nutty peanut powder with red chillies and garlic for a crunchy side to rice or tiffins.

reviews.comment: Perfect balance of nut and spice.

karapodi.name: Sesame Podi (నువ్వుల పొడి)
karapodi.description: Aromatic roasted sesame seeds ground with jaggery, salt, and chillies for a sweet-spicy mix.

reviews.comment: Unique and tasty, love it with rice.

karapodi.name: Curry Leaf Podi (కరివేపాకు పొడి)
karapodi.description: Fragrant curry leaves roasted with urad dal, chana dal, and spices for a healthy powder.

karapodi.name: Drumstick Leaf Podi (మునగ ఆకుల పొడి)
karapodi.description: Nutritious drumstick leaves roasted and blended with lentils and spices.

reviews.comment: Tastes good but a bit dry.

karapodi.name: Tamarind Leaf Podi (చింత ఆకుల పొడి)
karapodi.description: Tangy tamarind leaves mixed with chillies and garlic for a unique powder blend.

karapodi.name: Flaxseed Podi (ఆవిసె గింజల పొడి)
karapodi.description: Healthy flax seeds ground with dry chillies and garlic for a nutrient-rich mix.

karapodi.name: Gunpowder Podi (కారం పొడి)
karapodi.description: Fiery spice powder made from roasted lentils and chillies, best enjoyed with hot rice.

reviews.comment: Too spicy for me, but tastes great.
